name: riskscape
description: Interactive Multi-Factor Risk Simulator in the Browser

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:web
scripts.build:wasm: cd engine && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg --release
scripts.dev: npm run build:wasm && cd web && npm run dev
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules web/node_modules engine/target engine/pkg web/.next web/out
